text: Val-de-Virvée is a commune. It is found in the region Nouvelle-Aquitaine in the Gironde department in the southwest of France. The municipality was created on 1 January 2016 and consists of the former communes of Aubie-et- Espessas (the seat), Saint-Antoine and Salignac.Arrêté préfectoral 11 December 2015 == References == Category:2016 establishments in France Category:Communes in Gironde
title: Val-de-Virvée
